news.title: Gregg Wallace sacked from MasterChef as 50 more people make claims to BBC News
news.summary: The TV presenter has been the subject of an inquiry into alleged misconduct, to be published imminently.

news.title: Post Office scandal had 'disastrous' impact on victims, official inquiry says
news.summary: The scandal may have led to 13 suicides, the report says, as it criticises the "formidable difficulties" for victims getting compensation.

news.title: Three men guilty of arson attack on London warehouse on behalf of Russian mercenary group
news.summary: Around £1m worth of damage was caused in the arson attack on an industrial unit in Leyton, east London, last year.

news.title: Diogo Jota's car was likely speeding before fatal crash, Spanish police say
news.summary: The Liverpool player was killed with his brother when their Lamborghini car had a suspected tyre blowout.

news.title: Bayeux Tapestry to return to UK on loan after 900 years
news.summary: Bayeux Tapestry will be shown at the British Museum, which will lend treasures to Normandy museums.

news.title: Marseille firefighters 'waging war' on wildfire at city's edge, mayor says
news.summary: Marseille Provence airport is shut, as smoke clouds the city and residents are warned to stay indoors.

news.title: Southport murders one of UK's most egregious crimes, inquiry chairman says
news.summary: The public inquiry into the dance class murders in the Merseyside town begins at Liverpool Town Hall.

news.title: Monzo fined £21m after customers faked PM and King's addresses
news.summary: The digital bank has been fined £21m by the City regulator for anti-fraud failures.

news.title: Pension triple lock to cost three times initial estimate
news.summary: The official forecaster warns public finances are in a "relatively vulnerable position" due U-turns.

news.title: ICC issues arrest warrants for Taliban leaders for persecuting women and girls
news.summary: The Taliban's supreme leader and chief justice are accused by the Hague-based judges of gender persecution.
